<> (surrounding) results in: https://phonetics.as.uky.edu/
[]() text in in the square brackets, link in the parens = Phonetics Lab



start with “!” then the caption in square brakets. Then the image name in parens. Check source view if it isn’t working right.





Same as above but wrap in another set of square brackets. Then put a link in parens at the end (not in the brackets)





Add text in quotes after the link to add hover text


Figures are center aligned by default. Add the fig-align attribute to the image to use a different alignment. (Put fig-align=“left or right” in curly braces at the end)
